name: Alibaba Cloud RAM password policy does not have a symbol
description: This policy identifies Alibaba Cloud accounts that do not have a symbol in the password policy. As a security best practice, configure a strong password policy for secure access to the Alibaba Cloud console.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'alibaba_cloud' AND api.name = 'alibaba-cloud-ram-password-policy' AND json.rule = 'requireSymbols does not exist or requireSymbols is false'
recommendation:
1. Log in to Alibaba Cloud Portal
2. Go to Resource Access Management (RAM) service
3. In the left-side navigation pane, click on 'Settings'
4. In the 'Security Settings' tab, In the 'Password Strength Settings' Section, Click on 'Edit Password Rule'
5. In the 'Required Elements in Password' field, select 'Symbols'
6. Click on 'OK'
7. Click on 'Close'
compliance.standard: Australian Energy Sector Cyber Security Framework (AESCSF)
CyberSecurity Law of the People's Republic of China
Insurance Regulatory And Development Authority Of India
MITRE ATT&CK v15.1 Cloud IaaS for Enterprise
New Zealand Information Security Manual (NZISM v3.4)
RBI Baseline Cyber Security and Resilience Requirements
